title: President Rajapaksa joins the National Oil Anointing Ceremony
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana) The national oil anointing ceremony of the traditional Sinhala and Hindu New Year festival was held in Matara under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the Uposathagaraya Maha Vihara Sri Rohana Temple of Randoopatha (Golden Island) this morning on 16 April….
